title: Haikyuu Men's Police Officer Costume Blue Uniform with Cap for Halloween
features: Package Includes: Top, pants, hat, belt, holster, handcuff case, tie
The fabric used to make the costume is high-quality polyester, which is durable and comfortable.
Shirt has long sleeves, buttons at center front and sleeve cuffs, two chest pockets, and police patch on the arm.
Pants have functional pockets on each side. Belts are made of pu leather, easy to clean.
SIZE: Please refer to the size table in the product description.
This product is designed and made by haikyuu.
description: Blue Police Officer outfit comes with a top, pants, hat, belt, holster, handcuff case and tie. It's made of uniform cloth/polyester blend fabric that of great quality, durable and comfortable.
